questions.uddipok: Write a paragraph on 'Benefits of Early Rising'.

sub_questions.explanation:
The Benefits of Early Rising
Early rising is a habit that can profoundly transform one’s physical, mental, and emotional well-being. Starting the day early provides a sense of calm and quiet, free from the usual distractions of a bustling world, making it an ideal time for self-reflection, planning, and setting priorities. This peaceful environment allows for a more focused and productive morning routine, often boosting efficiency throughout the day. One of the greatest benefits of early rising is the ability to exercise or meditate in the serene morning hours, which promotes physical health, reduces stress, and sharpens the mind. Additionally, early risers tend to enjoy better sleep patterns, as waking up early aligns with the body’s natural circadian rhythm, fostering overall health and energy levels.
Another significant advantage is the opportunity to plan the day ahead. Early risers can map out tasks and goals with a clear mind, leading to improved time management and reduced feelings of overwhelm. Moreover, catching the early sunlight helps boost vitamin D levels, which is vital for maintaining strong immunity and mood stability. This habit also creates more time for personal development, whether through reading, learning a new skill, or simply enjoying hobbies that bring joy.
Professionally, early risers often have a competitive edge as they start the day ahead of others, enabling them to handle work responsibilities with better preparedness and reduced stress. The positive ripple effect of early rising extends to mental health, as it fosters a sense of accomplishment and confidence by completing tasks early in the day. In essence, cultivating the habit of waking up early not only enhances productivity but also promotes a balanced, healthier, and more fulfilling lifestyle.

A computer is an electronic machine that can quickly make calculations, store, rearrange and-retrieve information, or control another machine. Its main feature is speed and accuracy . The main components of a computer are a CPU, a monitor, a keyboard, a mouse, etc.

The usefulness of computer is immense in the present world. It is understood that true development is impossible without the introduction of computer in every ṣhere of our life.

Computer is being used in education sector. Computer education has been introduced in schools and college levels in Bangladesh. The results of SSC, HSC and many other examinations, some admission tests, etc. are published in a short time with the help of computer.

The use of computer in commerce and trade is remarkable. Computer has occupied the entire region of commerce in developed countries. Our country has also introduced computer in banks, private and government offices.
